description: Dr. Alchemy is a pawn of Savitar, a meta-human speedster he considers a god.  Alchemy's speech is controlled by Savitar; when Savitar acts independently, Alchemy becomes silent but retains combat and escape capabilities. He wears a green scaly undergarment, yellow belt, green pants, black boots, a green hooded cloak, a brown plague doctor mask, and black gloves.
